x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact: My solution could streamline those who want an easy way to find local volunteer events
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: For someone interested in volunteering, there are often too many websites you have to go to see if there are any local volunteer opportunities that fit your schedule
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

A Workspace dedicated to show upcoming events and track events you have signed up for

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Possibly integrations with calendars

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Being able to parse volunteer sites to pull the data
